# rules

**Instance Property**

An array of [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKTileGroupRule] objects that the tile group uses to determine tile placement.

## Declaration

```swift
var rules: [SKTileGroupRule] { get set }
```

## Accessing or Setting a Tile Group’s Properties

- **name**: The receiver’s name.
